import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplNiveau extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { selectedFormation: '', nomNiveau: '', duree: '', mntInitial: '', niveaux: [] } } componentDidMount() { if (JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))) != null) { let idFormation = this.props.location.state.idFormation; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_mediatraining/GetNiveauById.php?id=' + idFormation).then(res => { this.setState({ selectedFormation: res.data[0].formation.label, nomNiveau: res.data[0].nomNiveau, duree: res.data[0].duree, // niveaux: res.data[1] }) }) } } render() { return (
